bug.description:

comments.comment: That model is meant for testing not as a demo... here's a demo <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1F_RNcHzTfFuQf-LeKvSlud6x7jXYkG31>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1F_RNcHzTfFuQf-LeKvSlud6x7jXYkG31</denchmark-link>
